TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
Soyuz Advanced Docking Mechanisms Beta + Mir 6-Way Revamp Preview:

http://i.imgur.com/WI356XJ.gif

Beta Dropbox Download (When you download, please try to break it and make it do ugly things so I can make it better.)

Currently, the beta parts have different names than the existing docking mechanisms, so they will NOT replace your existing ports and break saves. When these docking mechanisms do get released, they will replace your existing 0.9375m probe and drogue docking ports. Don't worry, they don't break saves. All you have to do is reattach them in the editor as the dimensions are slightly different. Nothing catastrophic.

http://i.imgur.com/kVooNsf.pnghttp://i.imgur.com/FYgAyx3.png

http://i.imgur.com/pszUO8n.png

http://i.imgur.com/4xpMUO0.gif

INSTRUCTIONS:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Prior to docking, make sure the docking probe is extended.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Once soft-dock has occurred, rotate to desired position, then click "Retract Probe" from the actions menu to initiate hard-dock.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Make sure when you undock, the probe is still retracted. If you undock with the probe extended, it'll fling your spacecraft apart violently. If you don't extend or retract the probe while already docked, this will be a non-issue.

Beale has the source model files, and once he touches up the textures, he'll send them back to me for Unity export and eventual release.

I've also greatly improved and revamped the Vega/Mir Node. It's modeled, but not really textured. Texturing is Beale's area of expertise, not mine.

http://i.imgur.com/2JgLZiw.pnghttp://i.imgur.com/gcP3U8t.pnghttp://i.imgur.com/wtVbUSi.png

Apologies. I should have been more clear. I assumed people would know what to do. Put both the .mu and .cfg files in your GameData/Tantares/Parts/SOYUZ folder. They will NOT replace the current docking ports, just exist alongside for now.

PLEASE try to do ugly things with them and break them. Don't integrate them into your designs fully yet, as they'll get removed when Beale updates. Just test them out.

So the experimental docking port would still be in the part list after the upgrade, right? So I could swap it out in situ with KIS after the official release?

I'll try to explain. Basically, the name in the configs for the beta docking ports are Tantares_DockingMechanism_Z and Y respectively. The existing 0.9375m docking mechanisms are named Tantares_DockingMechanism_A and B respectively.

I named the beta parts suffix Z and Y so they would not conflict with or overwrite the existing ports allowing them to exist independently for comparison and experimentation. If all goes well and the docking mechanisms are updated to my revised models, the Z and Y named ports I released will be DELETED, and the A and B ports will be updated to the new model. ANY craft file or vessel containing the Z and Y ports will NOT be able to load. You'll get the "craft could not be loaded because X part is missing" message. I intended the ports for testing, not for play.

I would not use them in anything you want to use long term, especially in career. Use them in sandbox mode and mess around with them.
Will the next update include the fregat as well?

I'm looking for name suggestions for the craft in my crewed Eve mission which will use mostly Tantares parts. I want names for the following:

Crew Transfer Vehicle (moderately large craft, assembled in orbit, houses four kerbals

Gilly Lander (light, two Kerbal craft, based on same principles as LK

Eve High Atmosphere Plane (yeah, maybe I'm crazy, I plan to use this for a pass into Eve's upper atmosphere)

Eve Descent Probe(s)(heavy probe to be sent into Eve's atmosphere by the crew)

Any other vehicles anyone can think of (not an Eve lander, no way, I'm not ready for that)

Oh my gosh! That looks so nice! It's perfect. So cool to see it textured. I'll post the technique a littler later today. It involved circularizing a square.

Personally, as far as what to do next goes:

1. Docking port and ATV solar panel texture cleanup. Then I can shoot them back to you exported and possibly send you the unity scene. It's not too large.

2. Scale the PLV up to 2.5m to support Enhanced Cynus.

3. Soyuz solar panel revamp?

4. Release all updated parts to date including Fregat and Lunar probe.

5. Begin Fuji revamp before totally new parts.

Don't worry about the APAS remodel for now. I've got something in the works that should be really neat.
